channel.title: Some of my projects on Learning is living
channel.description: Recent content in Some of my projects on Learning is living

item.title: autotester
item.description: Building on agilentpyvisa, this is an attempt to create an extensible bot framework that can automate device characterization.

item.title: agilentpyvisa
item.description: In order to ease my testing and characterization life, I am hacking on a simple control library for VISA devices.
